Title: This Is the Leadership That Formed America with Stephen Mansfield
Description:
Join us as our host, George Kamel, talks to Stephen Mansfield. Stephen is a bestselling author and speaker. And he’s the guy Entreleadership goes to when we want to talk history and leadership. In this episode, Stephen takes us back to history class as he talks about the leadership that formed America. Get ready—we’re headed into a time machine!


You’ll learn:

•      Things you didn’t know about the Founding Fathers

•      How leaders change history

•      If we’re celebrating independence on the wrong day

•      The top leadership lessons to take from the Founding Fathers
